content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Bibi Zhou

}}
Bibi Zhou (), also known as Bibi Zhou or Bibi Chow, is a Chinese singer and songwriter. She has won hundreds of awards and accolades from music, fashion, entertainment, image, film, philanthropy.
2012 The China Pride·Love China Ceremony
2012 The China Pride·Love China Ceremony(Chinese:2012中国娇子·中国爱盛典)is a TV special ceremony, held by Sichuan Provincial Television station SCTV, to honour people in charity, especially during 2008 Wenchuan earthquake.
!
|-
|2012
|Bibi Zhou
|Loving Heart Public Figure(Chinese: 爱心公益人物)
|
|
9+2 Music Pioneer Awards
9+2 Music Pioneer Awards, is a music awards show founded by Guangdong radio to honor Guangdong and Hong Kong Cantonese artist.9+2 is referring to the Pan-pearl river delta region.
